creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Adam and Eve at L standing under a fruit tree; robed figure at R with a beard holds up PL hand, addressing the couple
marks:
Signature, Date

in graphite on verso, center of monogram and date in plate, lower right: [AG / 154
provenance: [Boerner until October 16, 1985; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: God Warns Adam and Eve
